remarks: Version of ~ rabbidva2 with dv condition replaced by non-freeness hypothesis.  (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2019.)
statement:
bj-rabbida2.nf $e |- F/ x ph $.
bj-rabbida2.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. A /\ ps ) <-> ( x e. B /\ ch ) ) ) $.
bj-rabbida2 $p |- ( ph -> { x e. A | ps } = { x e. B | ch } ) $.
